title: Nine Inch Nails - Ghosts I-IV (2008) (Apple Lossless)
description:
This is the full Apple Lossless version (plus extras) of Ghosts I-IV by Nine Inch Nails.

You really should pay for this download at http://ghosts.nin.com/

I am seeding this torrent because NIN was cool enough to release Ghosts I-IV under a Creative Commons license before their download site failed.

Enjoy, support musicians, see live music, and fuck the RIAA!
